messages.title: Strong Leadership on Jobs
messages.content: Securing economic stability and creating jobs. Help businesses with lower tax on jobs to support our economy and strengthen workers' rights. Protect those in low-paid jobs by raising the Living Wage. Start 3 million new apprenticeships by 2020. Increase childcare for working families to 30 hours a week. Offer a £12bn plan to grow our prosperity.

messages.title: Strong Leadership for our Community
messages.content: Invest in schools to ensure every child gets the best start. Spend a record £500m on roads and transport to tackle air pollution and improve road safety. End the elephant in the room, Heathrow expansion, with an independent review by a judge. Protect our local environment, offering £1bn for cleaner air. Offer £200m to support local community sports and greater protection for green spaces.

messages.title: Strong Leadership Against Crime
messages.content: Fight crime and low-level disturbance with more local police on our streets. £61.7m boost for London to tackle knife crime. Stand up for victims of crime with an independent commissioner to stand up for their rights.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing economic stability and creating jobs. Help businesses with lower tax on jobs to support our economy and strengthen workers' rights. Protect those in low-paid jobs by raising the Living Wage. Start 3 million new apprenticeships by 2020.
Invest in schools, road safety, clean air, and local sports. £1bn for cleaner air and £200m for local community sports.
Fight crime with more local police, £61.7m boost for tackling knife crime, independent commissioner for the rights of victims.
